pr_title: [INFRA-19670] Add .asf.yaml to allow for a Github Whitelist for testing

timeline.message: [INFRA-19670] Add .asf.yaml to allow for a Github Whitelist of test submitters.

timeline.bodyText: Let's add a comment for the purpose of this list and is their any prerequisit for people to be added to this list?
timeline.author: angoenka
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@

+
+github:
+  description: "Apache Beam is a unified programming model for Batch and Streaming"
+  homepage: https://beam.apache.org/
+
+jenkins:
+  github_whitelist:

replies.bodyText: I would suggest adding instructions to the Connect with the community section of the website pointing to this file.
replies.author: lukecwik

timeline.message: Adding list of authors for last merged 1000 PRs
